calculations.name: Revenue Tier
calculations.tableau_expression: IF [Net Revenue ]>1000 THEN "High Margin" ELSEIF [Profit Margin %]>10 THEN "Medium Margin" ELSE "Low Margin" END

calculation_context.Expression: IF [Net Revenue ]>1000 THEN "High Margin" ELSEIF [Profit Margin %]>10 THEN "Medium Margin" ELSE "Low Margin" END
